concept.definition: Any method of routinely determining whether or not certain adverse events have occurred, for example through a standard questionnaire, regular investigator assessment, regular laboratory testing, or other method
Any non-systematic method for determining whether or not adverse events have occurred, such as self-reporting by participants or occasional assessment/testing

description: The method used to determine the characteristic(s) of the variable.
name: CharacteristicMethod

text.div:
This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/characteristic-method defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
systematic-assessment Systematic Assessment Any method of routinely determining whether or not certain adverse events have occurred, for example through a standard questionnaire, regular investigator assessment, regular laboratory testing, or other method
non-systematic-assessment Non-Systematic Assessment Any non-systematic method for determining whether or not adverse events have occurred, such as self-reporting by participants or occasional assessment/testing

title: CharacteristicMethod
